nodes.text: Assault on the House Thul compound

During the Cold War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic, a young Jedi Knight stormed a compound in the Juran Mountains of Alderaan belonging to the Imperial-aligned House Thul. Having learned that the supposed Republic researcher Aleyna Hark was actually an Imperial spy with the targeting device of the Death Mark laser superweapon, the Jedi Knight raced to rescue Duke Horis Thul before Hark could kill him with the stolen Republic superweapon and sabotage the peace talks with House Organa.
